title: 03/18/22 DPS Hour 1 Kentucky Upset, Devante Adams
itunes:title: 03/18/22 DPS Hour 1 Kentucky Upset, Devante Adams
description:
In hour 1 of the Dan Patrick show, the guys discuss the upset of No.2 Kentucky vs No.15 St.Peters. Dan Patrick also throws out his theory of why Coach Calipari doesn't have much success in March Madness. Also the recent news of Davante Adams now be a Las Vegas Raider.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
